eksath jathika pakshaye nayaka
dambaakola patuna dan ayithi yakada sapaththu ranata.
kese wethath ada (09) kolambaadi pawathi madhya hamuwe di me pilibandawa shri lanka krikat aayathanaya niwedanaya kala.
mara chiwaradharin wisin anyagamikayanta erehiwa karanu labana mewani apakirthimath ranganayak pilibandawa kisiwek wiwechanaya karathoth apeksha kala yuththe gal muguru ya.
